meanings.definition: The act or process of setting in operation or motion.
meanings.sent1: The startup of the machine was smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The startup of the computer took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The startup of the party had everyone dancing in no time.
meanings.sent4: The startup of the car engine sounded like a gentle purr.
meanings.sent5: The startup of the rocket ship was met with cheers and excitement.

meanings.definition: A newly established business or organization.
meanings.sent1: The tech startup quickly gained popularity in the market.
meanings.sent2: She decided to invest in a startup focused on sustainable fashion.
meanings.sent3: The startup of the lemonade stand was a hit with the neighborhood kids.
meanings.sent4: The startup of the bakery brought fresh pastries to the town.
meanings.sent5: The startup of the bookstore created a cozy reading nook for customers.

meanings.definition: To start or set in operation.
meanings.sent1: He will startup the generator to provide electricity during the outage.
meanings.sent2: She had to startup the computer before beginning her work.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to startup a lemonade stand in the park.
meanings.sent4: The chef will startup the oven to bake the delicious cake.
meanings.sent5: They will startup the project once all the team members are ready.
